title: As a BOC user I want to pause the Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://aceshn.axshare.com/#p=picking_ribbon_treatments

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When the draft is in progress, there is a "Pause Draft" button on the Draft Day screen for BOC users. 
* Clicking "Pause Draft" will replace the "Pause Draft" button with a "Resume Draft" button. 
* The Submit and Pass buttons will become disabled for Club Users
* The Draft for Org, Pass, Approve, and Reject buttons will become disable for BOC Users 
* The Picking Ribbon on the Draft Day Screen and Draft Display screens will indicate that the draft is paused (see wire for R5 example).
* Both BOC Users and Club Users will see the updated picking ribbons.

title: As a BOC user I want to Resume the Draft
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* When the Draft is paused, there is a "Resume Draft" button on the Draft Day screen for BOC Users
* Clicking "Resume Draft" will re-enable all of the relevant action buttons on the Draft Day screen for both BOC and Club Users 
* The "Resume Draft" button is once again replaced with a "Pause Draft" button.
* The pick ribbons will return to their normal, in progress state on both the Draft Day and Draft Display screens

title: As a User, I want to filter draft results on the Draft Display
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=draft_display

Acceptance Criteria:
 - On the Draft Display tab, there will be three dropdowns as depicted on the wire:
  - Position
   -- Default: All
   -- Values: All, 1B, 2B, 3B, C, CF, INF, LF, LHR, LHS, OF, RF, RHR, RHS, SS, DH, UTL
  - Round
   --  Default: All 
   --  Values: values will update in real-time to reflect all round that have been completed or are in progress
  - Org
   -- Default: All
   -- Values: All, the abbreviations of all 30 ML Orgs
 - Selecting a value from any of the dropdowns will refresh the table to show only the values indicated by the filter

title: As a User, I want the Show Drafted Players Toggle to Work
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_draft_in_progress

AC:
 - On the Available Players widget and the Pick Queue widget, there will be a "Show Drafted Players" toggle as depicted in the provided wire
 - When the toggle is set to Yes, player's who have been drafted will continue to appear in the widgets but will be crossed out
 - When the toggle is set to No, player's who have been drafted will not appear in the widgets

title: As a User, I want the Available Player widget to have an updated date/time field
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_available_players_enabled

AC:
 - The Available Players Widget will not update in real-time as players are added to the system and marked as Eligible
 - The widget will update once a day, after the Pre-Draft Batch has completed
 - Prior to the draft (as determined by checking the Rule 4 system dates), the widget will display the last date and time the widget was updated
 - During the days of the draft (as determined by checking the Rule 4 system dates), the last updated date/time will be hidden

title: As a BOC User, I want the DB to be updated once a player is drafted
custom_steps:
'Acceptance Criteria:
 - Once a player selection is approved, the following must occur:
   - The player's Rule 4 Status must be updated from "Eligible" to "Drafted"
   - The position tied to his profile will be updated to reflect the position at which he was drafted
   - The consent required flag will be set for the player
    -- This can be verified in the Draft History widget on the player's profile
   - Update Draft_Order_Pick to Pick_Flag_True

- At the conclusion of the draft, any player not drafted will have his Rule 4 Status updated from "Eligible" to "Passed Over"

**Note:**  No re-draft records will be created at this time.

title: As a User, I want the system to determine when the end of the Draft has occurred
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://aceshn.axshare.com/#p=picking_ribbon_treatments

Acceptance Criteria: 
* On Approve of the last pick or pass of the last Org in the last round of the draft, the system should recognize that there are no remaining picks in the Draft. This includes:
* The picking ribbon will update on the Draft Day and Draft Display tabs with a message stating "Draft Complete" - consistent with the examples in the provided wire
* Users connected to a draft screen will be giving a blocking message:
  - **Title:** Draft Complete
 - **Body:** The [Year] Rule 4 Draft has concluded.  Thank you for participating.
 - **Buttons:** Ok
* Clicking Ok, or the 'X', will dismiss the message and no further action will be taken

title: As a BOC User, I want to Load Pending Selection information to the Commissioner's Screen
custom_steps:
'Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_player_selected
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=pick_info_loaded

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1419+Data+Discovery+-+CS+editor

Acceptance Criteria:
- On the BOC's Draft Day screen, there will be a "Launch Commissioner's Screen" button in the Commissioner's Screen Controls section
 - Clicking this button will open the Commissioner's Screen viewer in a new window
 - On the BOC's Draft Day screen, there will be a "Load Pending Selection" button in the Commissioner's Screen Controls section
 - Clicking the button loads the correct text combination for the current pick and replaces the saved placeholders with the correct values for the player selected
 - If the Commissioner's Screen Display is not open when the button is clicked, the Display will open to show the text (revision: The Commissioners screen should be open first.  It won't open when clicking the other button)

title: As a BOC User, I want to Clear Text Settings for Current Year
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_import_text
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_current_year


Acceptance Criteria:
 - There will be a "Clear Text Settings for Current Year" button, as depicted in the provided wire
 - Clicking the "Clear Text Settings for Current Year" button will launch a warning message for the user:
**Header**: Warning
**Body**: This action will delete all combinations and any associated text for the current year.
**Hint**: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.
**Buttons**: Ok, Back
 - Clicking Ok will delete all combinations and text that has been entered, or imported, for the current year
 - Clicking Back will close the warning message and no action will be taken.

title: As a BOC User, I want to Edit the formatting of the Commissioner's Screen
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_current_year

Acceptance Criteria:
 - On the Commissioner's Screen Editor tab, there will be a "Commissioner's Screen Settings" section
 - Within the section, users will have the ability to edit the following:
  - Font Color
    -- Default: White
  - Background Color
    -- Default: Black
  - Font Size
    -- Default: 36x
    -- Values: 18px, 24px, 30px, 36px, 48px, 60px, 72px, 96px
  - Line Spacing
    -- Default: 60px
    -- Values: 24px, 30px, 36px, 48px, 60px, 72px, 96px, 106px, 124px
  - Font Weight
    -- Default: Regular
    -- Values: Regular, Bold
 - These settings will dictate how the text displayed on the Commissioner's Screen Viewer is presented 
 - The settings will be retained without needing to save until they are changed again

Colors:
black - 000000
white - ffffff
grey - 666666
blue - 0000CC
green - 006600
yellow - FFFF00
red - FF0000
purple - 990099

title: As a BOC User, I want to Preview the Commissioner's Screen Text
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_current_year
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=pick_info_loaded

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1419+Data+Discovery+-+CS+editor

Acceptance Criteria:
 - There will be a "Preview" button on the Commissioner's Screen Editor tab
 - When a row in the combinations widget is selected, the button will become active
 - If there is no row selected, the button will be inactive.
 - Clicking the "Preview" button will open a new window
 - The preview window will contain the text saved for the combination chosen and the specified formatting settings
 - Any placeholders in the pane will replaced with sample text
 - If all text doesn't fit in the window, the text is shrunk to fit without a scroll bar.

title: As a BOC User, I want to Remove a Row from the Players In Attendance table
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_current_year

Acceptance Criteria:
 - When a player's row is in view mode, there will be a trash can icon
 - Clicking the trash can icon will prompt the user to confirm they want to delete the row
 - If they confirm the deletion, the row and any accompanying text will be removed from the system
 - If they do not confirm the changes, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a BOC User, I want to Cancel Changes to a Row in the Players In Attendance table
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_edit_combination

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1419+Data+Discovery+-+CS+editor

Acceptance Criteria:
 - While a player's row in is edit mode, there will be a red cancel icon
 - Clicking the icon will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made
 - Confirming the cancellation will dismiss any updates made to the row values and return the row to view mode
 - If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken

title: As a developer, I want to rework the error messages, warnings, and hidden messages
custom_steps:
Currently we are adding error messages as constants and then simply adding the constant string into the error message object.  For messages targeted to a specific user, I'd like to rework how we are doing it to add a 'code' value to a single list which can then determine based on the user whether or not the error is a warning, error, or hidden.

This would bring things more in line with how they work throughout ebis.

We wouldn't be able to use the database, so this is likely still going to be built in a java class, but I'd like it to be as similar to the rest of the system as possible.

title: As a developer I want to delete users from the cache using their key value
custom_steps:
Currently we are using N1QL to delete R4 and R5 users who haven't polled in over 10 minutes from the cache.  Instead we should call the provider's get user method, loop through the users and for any past the expiration call the providers delete by key method.

Also the R5 side is currently still expiring after 30 seconds, change that to ten min
